item.title: EBNF Extended Backus Naur Format
item.description: EBNF is a way of describe grammars which is useful for precisely describing the formats of things. I was introduced to it in the diagrams of Nicklaus Wirth’s book on Pascal where he elegantly defines a language and its syntax. I am going to start with the definition of EBNF in EBNF in a go parser Package ebnf is a library for EBNF grammars. The input is text ([]byte) satisfying the following grammar (represented itself in EBNF):
